publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2525.3 Fiona Hyslop: SNP Government Failure on Jobs for Newly-Qualified Teachers—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2525) in the name of Rhona Brankin, leave out from "with concern" to end and insert "that the Scottish Government has set up the Teacher Employment Working Group, due to report in October 2008, which includes members from the General Teaching Council for Scotland, teacher education institutions, COSLA, the Association of Directors of Education in Scotland, teacher unions, the headteachers’ associations and the Scottish Government, to establish whether the long-standing teacher workforce planning process remains fit for purpose. Supported by: Maureen Watt*
